Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
2nd Generation Restaurant Opportunity
On-Site Parking in Rear + Valet Opportunity
Free-standing Restaurant since 1936
Fully built-out and newly renovated

Fabulous Restaurant Opportunity on the Famous Bevery Hills Restaurant Row. Located near the incoming La Cienega Metro Stop, 50 N La Cienega is located on the ground floor of a mixed use property with on-site parking. Neighboring tenants include Spice Affair, Lawrys, Matsuhisa, GENWA, Gyu-Kaku, and more!

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: BH Restaurant Row Flagship Restaurant Space
Restaurant on Robertson in Beverly Hills
